attributes.action: Introduce USA style "vanity" numberplates that spell words
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
There are a limited number of numberplate combinations- by
    introducing a full word series of numberplates such as "HELLO" 
    or "GOODBYE" the DVLA can earn extra revenue and the public can
    have another chance to purchase their ideal numberplate 
    combination. such "vanity" plates will also help to clamp down 
    on mis spaced and misrepresented numberplates which arise where
    the exact combination isn't available and the plate is
    distorted to be something it isn't

rejection.details: Please address the excessive use of capital letters.
reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
